text: Ram Boolchand Jethmalani (14 September 1923 â€“ 8 September 2019) was an Indian lawyer and politician. He was born in Shikarpur, Bombay Presidency . Jethmalani was a member of the Rashtriya Janata Dal. Until 2016, he was a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. Jethmalani MP from 1977 through 1984 and again from 2010 until his death. He was Minister of Law and Justice in 1996 and again from 1999 through 2000 and Urban Development from 1998 through 1999. Jethmalani died on 8 September 2019 in New Delhi at the age of 95.Ram Jethmalani, Eminent Supreme Court Lawyer and Former Law Minister, Passes Away at 96 ==References== ==Other websites== * Bio-profile of Jethmalani as Lok Sabha Member * Rajya Sabha Member Category:1923 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Indian lawyers Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians Category:Politicians from Mumbai Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Ram Jethmalani
